row.process:
:SET &variableName# = "UC4_RV.DB_GENERIC.SEARCH_ENTRY_&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#" :SET &variablePath# = "INTERNAL/RUNBOOK/DATABASE/VARIABLE" :SET &variableLine# = "" :SET &key# = "" :SET &startRecording# = "0" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE
:IF &ret# <> 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = &ret# :ELSE : SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") : PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Processing Resultset ...") : SET &posCount# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Affected Rows: ") : IF &posCount# > 0 : SET &posCount# = &posCount# + 15 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&posCount#) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_COUNT_ROWS# = &line# : ENDIF : IF &pos# > 0 : SET &startRecording# = "1" : ELSE : IF &startRecording# = "1" : SET &variableLine# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &length# = STR_LENGTH(&variableLine#) : SET &length# = SUB(&length#, 1) : IF &length# > 1 : SET &posLineNr# = STR_FIND(&variableLine#, &UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR#) : IF &posLineNr# > 0 : SET &posLineNrLength# = SUB(&posLineNr#, 1) : SET &key# = MID(&variableLine#, 1, &posLineNrLength#) : SET &posLineNrLength# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_SQL_SEPARATOR#) : SET &posLineNr# = ADD(&posLineNr#, &posLineNrLength#) : SET &variableLine# = STR_CUT(&variableLine#, &posLineNr#) : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&key#", "&variableLine#" : ELSE : SET &startRecording# = "0" : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS :ENDIF :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_SQL_QUERY# = "&variableName#"
